content:
Here is an example of an immunoassay system product profile. Remember the structure, style and content in context to the product description manual:

VITROS 4600 is an immunoassay system used for the in vitro measurement of various clinical analytes including serum, plasma, urine, and cerebrospinal fluid. It consists of a clinical chemistry analyzer, display monitor, controls, reagents, and disposable insrumentation. The analyzer features VITROS MicroSlide technology which is intended to minimize operator interventions and maximize ease of use. Additionally, the analyzer includes VITROS Intellicheck technology which is designed to deliver real-time process monitoring and reduce the risk of incorrect result reporting.
